name: soybean oil refinery operation | soap | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/28095/documentation

This dataset represents the production of refined soybean oil, respectively soap stock, from crude soybean oil. 

From reception of crude soybean oil at the refinery gate through refining of crude soybean oil.  

 System boundary is at the refinery.
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/104:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats/1040:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Energy data for 2008; process inputs and other data from literature sources.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset is a recontextualization of the Global dataset.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology for alkaline refining process, which refers to caustic soda being added to degummed crude oil, which reacts with the free fatty acids (FFA) to form soap stock.  The oil/soap mixture is separated using a centrifuge, and filtration is performed to further clarify the oil from the soap.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset is a recontextualization of the Global dataset.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Mix of data from a major processor and from literature.

exchanges.description: Calculated value based on mass balance.
